TopicTitle: Are KSP Community and Mods & addons buttons in menu working for you?

Articles.Content: When I first got into KSP I clicked on mods & addons and it didn't work and now I wanted to check my mods there and it still doesn't work, Is it known bug or just me?

Moving to Tech Support.

1 hour ago, Numerlor said:

it didn't work

Can you be a bit more specific about what you mean by "didn't work"?

When I go to the main menu in KSP, and click the "Addons & Mods" item, it does exactly what it's supposed to:  opens a web browser window and takes me to https://mods.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal.  Is that not what happens for you?

Also, can you clarify what you mean by,

1 hour ago, Numerlor said:

I wanted to check my mods there

...do you mean, "I wanted to go to the Curse website to look at the mods I'm interested in downloading", or something else?

Sorry, didn't notice I was putting it in discussion and by checking my mod there I thought I can see my installed mods because I didn't know what it does, when I click on it it does nothing at all so i never had a chance to know what it was, could it maybe be caused by Antivirus?
I just discovered links in programs like Skype etc. don't work aswell so I think it is some kind of malware blocking it or some wird bug in operating system

If you want to look at list of installed mods, through steam:

 

>Right click KSP (In steam)

>Properties

>Local Files

>Browse Local Content

>Game Data

 

There will be a "Squad" folder already in there. DO NOT EVER delete that. (That's the game its self)

Any other thing that the squad folder is an add-on.

 

Hope I help you with what you are trying to do!

 

Cheers!

-TheKorbinger

1 hour ago, TheKorbinger said:

Hope I help you with what you are trying to do!

I know how to install mods etc. I just thought that button would allow me to see installed mods in game without going into folder, but since no links are working over here I couldn't know that button was justsupposed to redirect me to curse site, thanks anyway
